data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Waterford that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Waterford, Ireland
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 116,200 people living in Waterford.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 64 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 116,200 citizens of Waterford, Ireland, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, 116,200 people live in the state of Waterford. Please, give them 23 new simple churches this year.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Waterford, Ireland who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Waterford, Ireland, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Waterford
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary:
the state of Waterford, Ireland has a population of 116,200.

We estimate Waterford has 1,806 people who might know Jesus, 104,408 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,986 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 64 neighbors who need Jesus.
